group_1.textRight: Hmph.
So that goddamn monk isn't@gonna get killed?

group_1.textLeft: There was a petition from Mizuna,@so they're now making the decision…

group_1.textRight: You and your clan are way@too soft, Tsuyu…

group_1.textLeft: I won't blame you for calling me such,@but I can't just harden my heart…
However, even at best, he'll still be exiled@and we'll never see him again.

group_1.textRight: …To me, he's just an enemy,@but to you he's an old friend.
I'm sorry if I offended you.

group_1.textLeft: Yep! Yep! Let's put an end@to all this dreary talk!
You're going to Mizuna Shrine to watch@a Kōwakamai performance, right?
In that case, you've gotta enjoy it@as much as possible!

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* You're right.
I've heard the stories it's based on over@and over, so I'm looking forward to it.
You guys are coming along, right?

group_1.textLeft: …Um, well…

group_1.textRight: Oh, are you not going?

group_1.textLeft: …I mean, I think this is our goodbye.

group_1.textRight: So, your friend was saved?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah.

group_1.textRight: Things have been so busy, I completely@forgot your purpose for being here.
I suppose this is for the best.
The main reason you were by my side@was to save your friend's life.

group_1.textLeft: I'm sorry.
I really wish we could stay longer and@watch over you both, but…
Yeah, the longer we stay, the more@complicated things become.

group_1.textRight: I don't really understand, but can't you@stay and relax with us for one more day?
Maybe we can ask my dad to throw@you a proper farewell party.
That's a great idea, I'll ask my father@for assistance as well.

group_1.textLeft: No, I think it's better that@we don't drag this out.
If we stay any longer,@I might not want to leave…

group_1.textRight: Well…if that's what you believe is best.
I'll miss you, but at least drop by sometime@when you get the chance!
Yes, of course, we'd love to have@you as a guest.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you so much, both of you.
I'm looking forward to seeing you@again in the future…
Oh, wait…

group_1.textRight: W-what is it?

group_1.textLeft: Please don't write about us@in your diary or anything!

group_1.textRight: I don't see why I shouldn't.
Thanks to the two of you, I was able@to become friends with Chizuru.
You were our magpie, connecting us@across the Milky Way.

group_1.textLeft: So, anyways, it was nice to meet you!

group_1.textRight: The future will not change.

group_1.textLeft: Even the future where Princess Tsuyu@becomes a Witch…

group_1.textRight: And Chizuru is killed by one herself…

group_1.textLeft: Nemu, how can you be so calm,@knowing their fate?

group_1.textRight: I carry a heavy heart as well.
I'm reminded of a story from the Kōwakamai@that the two of them went to see.

group_1.narration: ―Chizuru―@Hey, tell me another story later―@The Chronicle of the Future.
―Tsuyu―@It's one where Ushiwakamaru travels to the world@of the Tengu and inquires about his future…
"There is more to that story than just@the meeting between Yoritomo and Yoshitsune@and the defeat of the Heike Clan."
"It describes Yoritomo and Yoshitsune's@parting as well."
